page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: {Farming }has always played an important part in the economy of the area around Lanark.This can be seen quite clearly in the sucess of {Lanark {Market},which is patronized not only by border farmers ,but by farmers from as far away as Ireland and the South of England.The Irish tend to be interested in the implement sales,whereas the farmers from the South of England are more interested in buying lambs towards the end of the summer.A visit to {Lanark Market }is also popular with people out for a run in the country.Lanark is also an important centre for the marketing of the tomatoes and fruit from the {Clyde {Valley.}Finally a look at a map will show the reason why Lanark has always been an important centre agriculturally. { }
